long_description: The windproof REI All Weather cap combines the comfort of a baseball cap with reflective hits so you can stay warm and visible during nighttime runs. Polyester fleece construction is windproof and breathable. CoolMax(R) polyester sweatband wicks moisture away from forehead and dries quickly. Fold-down earflaps add warmth and protection from cold winter temps. Reflective trim in front and back increases your visibility at night. Strap in back adjusts the fit. Do not machine wash.
short_description: The windproof REI All Weather cap combines the comfort of a baseball cap with reflective hits so you can stay warm and visible during nighttime runs.
